include_directories(..)
include_directories(.)
if (NOT TARGET libyaml-cpp-amun)
  add_library(libyaml-cpp-amun OBJECT
    regex_yaml.cpp
    nodebuilder.cpp
    scanscalar.cpp
    scanner.cpp
    parser.cpp
    stream.cpp
    convert.cpp
    directives.cpp
    singledocparser.cpp
    memory.cpp
    node.cpp
    exp.cpp
    emitter.cpp
    emit.cpp
    null.cpp
    binary.cpp
    emitfromevents.cpp
    scantoken.cpp
    emitterstate.cpp
    scantag.cpp
    simplekey.cpp
    nodeevents.cpp
    tag.cpp
    contrib/graphbuilderadapter.cpp
    contrib/graphbuilder.cpp
    node_data.cpp
    emitterutils.cpp
    parse.cpp
    ostream_wrapper.cpp
    )
endif()
